SELECT ORD.ORD_NO, ORD.ORDERER_ID, ORD.ORDERER_NM, (SELECT ORD_GOODS_NM FROM ORD_GOODS WHERE ORD_NO = ORD.ORD_NO ORDER BY ORD_PROD_IDX LIMIT 1) AS ORD_PRODUCT_NM, ORD.ORD_ROUTE, CASE WHEN ORD.PAY_METHOD = '1' THEN '신용카드' WHEN ORD.PAY_METHOD = '2' THEN '계좌이체' WHEN ORD.PAY_METHOD = '3' THEN '무통장입금' WHEN ORD.PAY_METHOD = '4' THEN '카카오페이' ELSE '' END AS PAY_METHOD_NM, ORD.TOT_PRICE, ORD.ORD_DATE, CASE WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '1' THEN '주문접수' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '2' THEN '결제완료' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '3' THEN '배송준비중' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '4' THEN '배송처리' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '5' THEN '배송완료' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '6' THEN '주문취소' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '7' THEN '취소요청' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '8' THEN '취소완료' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '9' THEN '교환요청' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '10' THEN '교환완료' WHEN ORD.ORD_STATUS = '11' THEN '미주문' ELSE '' END AS ORD_STATUS_NM, ORD.REG_DATE FROM ORD_ORDER ORD WHERE ORD_NO = #{ORD_NO} AND ORD_STATUS = #{ORD_STATUS} AND PAY_METHOD = #{PAY_METHOD} AND DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{ORD_DATE_BEFORE} AND #{ORD_DATE_AFTER}
